infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This app uses the faceID for login authentication.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to get the user profile picture
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app uses the Save Photos feature to save the user's profile picture.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the Photo Library to get data for the user's profile picture.
